author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman’s chain was snatched in Ayanavaram on Wednesday night.

According to police officials, Iswarya was riding on her motorcycle through the area after visiting her relatives. A man and a woman on a motorcycle snatched her gold chain and sped away.

A case has been registered with the Ayanavaram police station and investigation is underway.
title: Woman’s chain snatched by duo on motorcycle
